item.title: First post
item.author: Shoaib Bakhtyar
item.description: When building the website, you can set a theme by using –theme option. However, we suggest you modify the configuration file (config.toml) and set the theme as the default. item.title: Second post
item.author: Shoaib Bakhtyar
item.description: When building the website, you can set a theme by using –theme option. However, we suggest you modify the configuration file (config.toml) and set the theme as the default. Some code here: 1 print("Hello World!") 1 print("hello")
